LanguageData.REN7_DarkChannelProjectile.label: dark channel
LanguageData.REN7_CarnageProjectile.label: high plasma projectile
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7HeavyHelmet.label: N7 heavy helmet
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7HeavyHelmet.description: A heavy helmet with high armor.
LanguageData.RE_Apparel_N7AdeptMask.label: N7 adept mask
LanguageData.RE_Apparel_N7AdeptMask.description: A mask with a hood. Greatly increases biotic energy regeneration rate.
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7Helmet.label: N7 helmet
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7Helmet.description: A helmet with decent armor. Makes the wearer completely resistant to toxins.
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7HeavyArmor.label: N7 heavy armor
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7HeavyArmor.description: A suit of incredibly damage-resistant powered armor, with a powerful overshield. It slows down the user when equipped, but provides best in class protection. Driven by eezo-assisted actuators, the N7 Destroyer soldiers carry heavy weapons onto the battlefield that no one else can match.
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7AdeptSuit.label: N7 adept suit
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7AdeptSuit.description: A full-body jumpsuit. The Fury suit greatly increases the biotic energy reserves of the user. \n\nThe N7 Furies are a terrifying and unpredictable sight on the battlefield. These operatives wind an unpredictable path on the battlefield, moving in and out of combat before returning to unleash a sweeping biotic attack on their unsuspecting targets.
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7Armor.label: N7 armor
LanguageData.REN7_Apparel_N7Armor.description: A suit of powered armor with a powerful overshield. Armor ratings are decent. It also increases pain shock threshold and mental break threshold. \n\nThe bulwark of the N7 special forces, the N7 Paladin Sentinels are a welcome sight by all members of the alliance military. One of them on the battlefield can hold the line against all comers, and drastically reduces friendly casualty statistics.
LanguageData.REN7_Omnishield.tools.0.label: base
LanguageData.REN7_Omnishield.tools.1.label: centre
LanguageData.REN7_Omnishield.label: omni shield
LanguageData.REN7_Omnishield.description: An omni shield capable of intercepting a majority of ranged and melee attacks.
LanguageData.REN7_MeleeWeapon_N7Blade.label: N7 blade
LanguageData.REN7_MeleeWeapon_N7Blade.description: A light monomolecular sword with high attack speed and armor penetration. \n\nThe favored weapon of the fearsome N7 Shadow Infiltrators. These blades are devastating in their hands, as they hide and then strike from the shadows in extreme close range.
LanguageData.REN7_MeleeWeapon_N7Blade.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.REN7_MeleeWeapon_N7Blade.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.REN7_MeleeWeapon_N7Blade.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.REN7_Bullet_N7BattleRifle.label: accelerated shot
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7BattleRifle.label: N7 battle rifle
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7BattleRifle.description:
A mass accelerator battle rifle. Firing slugs lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Valkyrie is a two-burst assault rifle with extreme range and good accuracy, but longer cooldown between shots. It is highly prized on the black market for it’s balance and effectiveness.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7BattleRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7BattleRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.REN7_Bullet_N7LMG.label: accelerated shot
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7LMG.label: N7 LMG
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7LMG.description:
A mass accelerator heavy LMG. Firing slugs lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Typhoon is an incredibly high penetration LMG that also applies a 10% chance to deflect any shot.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7LMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7LMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.REN7_Bullet_N7Shotgun.label: accelerated blast
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7Shotgun.label: N7 shotgun
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7Shotgun.description:
A mass accelerator heavy shotgun. Firing a spray of pellets lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles further shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Crusader shotgun sacrifices close range damage for the ability to fire at targets much farther away with effectiveness.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7Shotgun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.REN7_Bullet_N7DMR.label: accelerated sniper shot
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7DMR.label: N7 DMR
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7DMR.description:
A mass accelerator designated marksman rifle. Firing slugs lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Valiant is a 3 round burst rifle sacrificing some damage for extreme range.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7DMR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7DMR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RE_Bullet_N7Pistol.label: accelerated shot
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7SMG.label: N7 SMG
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7SMG.description:
A mass accelerator submachine gun. Firing slugs lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Hurricane rapid-firing 4 burst SMG, one of the fastest-firing weapons ever produced. While some militaries find it to be too inaccurate, the N7 SpecOps soldiers prize it for its overwhelming amount of suppressive fire.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7SMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.RE_Gun_N7Pistol.label: N7 pistol
LanguageData.RE_Gun_N7Pistol.description:
A mass accelerator autopistol. Firing slugs lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Eagle is a fully automatic 3-burst pistol. While it is named after the famed Desert Eagle, its strengths lie not in its single-shot firepower, but in its ability to provide sustained automatic fire.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.RE_Gun_N7Pistol.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.REN7_Bullet_N7AntimaterielRifle.label: accelerated anti-materiel shot
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7AntimaterielRifle.label: N7 anti-materiel rifle
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7AntimaterielRifle.description:
A mass accelerator anti-materiel rifle. Firing slugs lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Black Widow is a very powerful armor piercing sniper rifle. A modified version of the Alliance Antimateriel Rifle with slightly less damage and shorter cooldown.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7BlackHoleGenerator.label: N7 black hole generator
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7BlackHoleGenerator.descriptio: A single shot black hole gun. Creating an extremely powerful but unstable mass effect field, the rapidly-increasing gravity near the singularity's event horizon rips objects apart. \n\nThe M-490 Blackstorm fires a single slow projectile, but it draws all enemies into it, dealing heavy damage, and then explodes when it reaches its maximum distance. Absolutely devastating to groups of enemies.
LanguageData.REN7_Rocket_BlackHole.label: mini black hole
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7ChainShotgun.label: N7 chain shotgun
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7ChainShotgun.description:
A mass accelerator light shotgun. Firing spray of pellets lightened by mass effect fields using precision electromagnetism, its projectiles shatter on impact to increase the damage to the target. 

The Piranha is a powerful 2-burst shotgun with low cooldown but extremely short range. Designed for use by weaker soldiers who couldn’t handle the heavy recoil of other shotguns.

This weapon has a 10% chance to deal double damage.
LanguageData.REN7_Gun_N7ChainShotgun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.REN7_Bullet_N7ChainShotgun.label: accelerated blast
